code:
```mermaid
graph TB
    subgraph "Frontend"
        CDN[CDN]
        Static[Static Assets]
        SPA[Single Page App]
    end

    subgraph "API Gateway"
        Gateway[API Gateway]
        Auth[Authentication]
        Rate[Rate Limiting]
    end

    subgraph "Application Layer"
        API[API Server]
        Cache[Redis Cache]
        Queue[Message Queue]
    end

    subgraph "Data Layer"
        DB[(Primary Database)]
        Replica[(Read Replica)]
        Storage[Object Storage]
    end

    subgraph "Monitoring"
        Logs[Centralized Logging]
        Metrics[Metrics Dashboard]
        Alerts[Alert System]
    end

    CDN --> Static
    CDN --> SPA
    SPA --> Gateway

    Gateway --> Auth
    Auth --> Rate
    Rate --> API

    API --> Cache
    API --> Queue
    API --> DB

    DB --> Replica
    API --> Storage

    API --> Logs
    API --> Metrics
    Metrics --> Alerts
```

**Usage Instructions:**

1. **Copy this template** into your blog post
2. **Customize frontend components** for your stack (React, Vue, static)
3. **Add/remove API gateway features** based on your requirements
4. **Modify application layer** for your architecture (microservices, monolith)
5. **Adjust data layer** for your database choice (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc.)
6. **Customize monitoring** for your observability stack

**Used in 3 existing posts:**
- cloud-migration-journey-guide.md
- beyond-containers-future-deployment.md
- pizza-calculator.md

**Color scheme:** Sky Blue/Teal gradient (cloud topics) (#0ea5e9 → #10b981)
